alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry; Harrison; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:43AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Doniphan, northeastern Atchison, Buchanan, Worth, northern Clinton, Gentry, southwestern Harrison, Nodaway, Andrew and DeKalb Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hopkins to 7 miles north of Savannah to near Atchison. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Maryville, Atchison, Cameron, Savannah, Albany, Wathena, Elwood, Stanberry, Maysville, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Grant City, Stewartsville, Agency, Hopkins, Ravenwood, Union Star and Osborn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 48 and 50. Interstate 29 between mile markers 37 and 66. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry; Harrison; Nodaway; Worth
